name: RunSQLServerScripts
description: Executes SQL Server database scripts using the DbaTools module commandline tool.
author: pwshliquori

inputs.name: scriptPath
inputs.label: Script Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the SQL Server scripts.

inputs.name: databaseName
inputs.label: Database Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of database for script to run on.

inputs.name: user
inputs.label: User
inputs.helpMarkDown: User to connect to the SQL Server database.

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to connect to the SQL Server database. It is recommended to store the password is a secured variable or upload a secure file.

inputs.name: logPath
inputs.label: Log Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to save the log file after scripts have completed.

inputs.name: copy
inputs.label: Copy sql files to log
inputs.helpMarkDown: Copy .sql files to the log path.

inputs.name: failOnNullFiles
inputs.label: Fail on missing sql files
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if there are no sql files in the script path. If this is false, task will write "No sql files exist" to console.
